entry.title: 常用Riemann积分公式
entry.content:
常用Riemann积分公式

$$
\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{ax+b}},\mathrm{d}x = \frac{2}{3a^2}(ax - 2b)\sqrt{ax + b}
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{x^2 - a^2} = \frac{1}{2a} \ln\left| \frac{x - a}{x + a} \right|
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{x^2 + a^2} = \frac{1}{a} \arctan\left( \frac{x}{a} \right)
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{ax^2 + bx + c} =
\begin{cases}
\frac{2}{\sqrt{-\Delta}} \arctan\left( \frac{2ax + b}{\sqrt{-\Delta}} \right), & \Delta < 0 \
\frac{1}{\sqrt{\Delta}} \ln\left| \frac{2ax + b - \sqrt{\Delta}}{2ax + b + \sqrt{\Delta}} \right|, & \Delta > 0
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} = \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} \right|
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} = \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right|
$$

$$
\text{上面两个式子可以归并为}
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\sqrt{x^2 + y}} = \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 + y} \right| \quad (\text{不论} , y , \text{的正负})
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{(x^2 + a^2)^{3/2}} = \frac{x}{a^2 \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}}
$$

$$
\int \frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = \arcsin\left( \frac{x}{a} \right)
$$

$$
\int \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} ,\mathrm{d}x =
\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} \right|
$$

$$
\int \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} ,\mathrm{d}x =
\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} - \frac{a^2}{2} \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right|
$$

$$
\text{上面两个式子可以归并为}
$$

$$
\int \sqrt{x^2 + y} ,\mathrm{d}x =
\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 + y} + \frac{y}{2} \ln\left| x + \sqrt{x^2 + y} \right|
\quad (\text{不论} , y , \text{的正负})
$$

$$
\int \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} ,\mathrm{d}x =
\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \arcsin\left( \frac{x}{a} \right)
$$

$$
\int a^x ,\mathrm{d}x = \frac{a^x}{\ln a}
$$

$$
\int \tan x ,\mathrm{d}x = -\ln\left| \cos x \right|
$$

$$
\int \cot x ,\mathrm{d}x = \ln\left| \sin x \right|
$$

$$
\int \sec x ,\mathrm{d}x = \ln\left| \tan\left( \frac{x}{2} + \frac{\pi}{4} \right) \right| = \ln(\sec x + \tan x)
$$

$$
\int \csc x ,\mathrm{d}x = \ln\left| \tan\left( \frac{x}{2} \right) \right|
$$

$$
\int \sec^2 x ,\mathrm{d}x = \tan x
$$

$$
\int \csc^2 x ,\mathrm{d}x = -\cot x
$$

万能替换公式：

$$
\mathrm{d}x = \frac{2}{1 + t^2} ,\mathrm{d}t, \quad
\sin x = \frac{2t}{1 + t^2}, \quad
\cos x = \frac{1 - t^2}{1 + t^2}, \quad
t = \tan\left( \frac{x}{2} \right)
$$

entry.title: 概率论笔记01·概率测度空间的建立
测度论笔记01·单调类方法
entry.content:
sigma-代数方法

设$\mathcal{F} $为一个集族，即“集合的集合”，我们要证明$\mathcal{F}$里面的元素都具有某种性质$\mathcal{P}$，如果$\mathcal{F} = \sigma(\mathcal{A})$，那么我们可以按照以下步骤来证明：

  1. 设所有具有性质$\mathcal{P}$的集合的集合为$\mathcal{B}$，下面我们只需证明$\mathcal{F} \subset \mathcal{B}$
  2. 证明$\mathcal{B}$是一个$\sigma$-代数
  3. 证明$
    \mathcal{A} \subset \mathcal{B}
    $，然后由于$
    \mathcal{F} =\sigma \left( \mathcal{A} \right) \subset \sigma \left( \mathcal{B} \right) \xlongequal{\mathcal{B} \text{为}\sigma -\text{代数}}\mathcal{B}
    $，我们就已经证明了$\mathcal{F}$中的元素都具有性质$\mathcal{P}$
